...you were a Greek Philosophy student?

The study of Ancient Greek philosophy is broken down into three time periods: the Pre-Socratics, the Socratics, and the Post-Socratics. What was it like for the students of these times? Who were they? What did they study and which time would you fit into?

The Pre-Socratics

Ancient Greek philosophy can be broken down into three time periods: Presocratic, The Socratic, and Postsocratic. These different ideas and times revolve around Socraties and his ideas about humans and their place in the world. But, what was it like for the students of this time? Who were they? What did they study and which time would you fit into?
